MISSING_SKILLS: Evaluation and Testing of LLM Applications
RESUME_TIPS: Emphasize **LangChain** experience by mentioning projects where you've used it to build applications powered by large language models.  Highlight your experience with the latest version(3.0) and its enhanced features.
Include **LCEL** (LangChain Expression Language) examples in your projects section, demonstrating your ability to create chains using this declarative syntax. Focus on building complex workflows.
Add details about your experience with **RAG** (Retrieval Augmented Generation) pipelines, including the use of vector databases and document loaders. Provide specific examples.

Showcase your skills in **Prompt Engineering** by describing how you guide LLMs towards desired outputs using techniques like few-shot learning or chain-of-thought prompting. Demonstrate the effectiveness of your techniques.
Describe your proficiency in **Memory Management** within LangChain, explaining how you handle conversation history and context using LangChain's memory components. Mention specific use cases.

Detail any experience you have with **Tool Integration** by mentioning how you've integrated various tools into LangChain applications, such as APIs, databases, or custom functions. Explain the purpose and the result of the integration.
Explain your experience with **Callbacks and Debugging** in LangChain, detailing how you monitor and debug your applications. Mention the use of logging and tracing techniques.

Highlight your skills in **Evaluation and Testing** of LangChain applications, explaining how you ensure they meet performance and accuracy requirements. Specify the testing methodologies and metrics used.
Dedicate a section to projects showcasing your experience in building and deploying **AI-powered applications** using LangChain. Mention the specific challenges you faced and how you overcame them.

Quantify your achievements wherever possible, using metrics to demonstrate the impact of your work. For instance, mention improvements in performance, accuracy, or efficiency resulting from your LangChain implementations. Add more detail in your skills section with **Large Language Models (LLMs)**.

LangChain Development.DESCRIPTION: Learn LangChain's core components and build applications using LLMs. Covers chains, agents, memory, and callbacks.

LangChain Development.COURSE_NAME: Mastering LangChain: From Beginner to Expert
LangChain Development.DESCRIPTION: A comprehensive guide to LangChain, covering everything from basic concepts to advanced techniques for building complex LLM applications.
Overview of LangChain and how to build a simple LLM-powered application.

Large Language Models (LLMs).DESCRIPTION: Learn about NLP and LLMs, including topics like language models, sequence models, and transformers.

Large Language Models (LLMs).COURSE_NAME: NLP - Natural Language Processing with Python
Large Language Models (LLMs).DESCRIPTION: Covers fundamentals of NLP with Python, including text processing, sentiment analysis, and building language models.
A beginner-friendly introduction to LLMs and their applications.

Expressions Language (LCEL).DESCRIPTION: Learn about advanced features such as LCEL and memory management, for building interactive AI experiences.
Explore LCEL in detail, covering syntax, best practices, and advanced usage for creating efficient chains.
A tutorial on the basics of the Expression Language in LangChain.

Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG).DESCRIPTION: Understand how to build RAG pipelines, and use them to build AI applications for content creation and data management.
Learn practical implementation of RAG systems with LangChain, from vector databases to query optimization.
Build a RAG system from scratch using Python and open-source tools.

Vector Database Management.COURSE_NAME: Vector Databases: From Theory to Practice
Vector Database Management.DESCRIPTION: Learn about vector databases, their use cases, and how to manage them effectively for AI applications.
Practical guide to working with vector databases in Python for similarity search and RAG.
Tutorial covering the basics of vector databases and how to use them.

Advanced Prompt Engineering.DESCRIPTION: In this course, youâ€™ll gain the skills and knowledge to effectively communicate with and harness the power of large language models. Learn to write prompts, chain prompts, format prompts, and engineer more sophisticated and creative prompts.

Advanced Prompt Engineering.COURSE_NAME: Prompt Engineering: Write Prompts Like a Pro
Advanced Prompt Engineering.DESCRIPTION: Discover the secrets behind creating powerful prompts, learn the art of precision, and master the essential elements that make prompts effective and efficient.
Learn the basics of Prompt Engineering by creating a project.

Memory Component Handling.DESCRIPTION: Memory components allow LLMs to retain information from previous interactions, enabling conversational applications. Langchain 3.0 memory is enhanced for more context aware conversations.
Learn how to create LLM-powered applications with LangChain. Memory Management is a crucial concept covered in this course.
A basic tutorial on memory components used in LLMs and LangChain.

Tool Integration.DESCRIPTION: Learn to integrate various tools into LangChain applications, including APIs, databases, and custom functions. Learn to create your own tools.
This course will give you the tools you need to harness the power of LLMs for any application.
A basic tutorial on integrating external tools using LangChain framework.

Callback Utilization.DESCRIPTION: Learn how to use callbacks to monitor and debug your Langchain applications. Understanding how to log, and trace your applications.
This course is a complete guide to working with callbacks, which enable you to hook into various stages of a LangChain run.
A basic tutorial on implementing callbacks with LangChain.

Debugging LangChain Applications.DESCRIPTION: A beginner's course that will provide with the skills to Debugging LangChain Applications.
This course is the only thing you need to Debug your LangChain Appications.

Evaluation and Testing of LLM Applicatio.COURSE_NAME: Test and Evaluate LLM Applications with LangChain
Evaluation and Testing of LLM Applicatio.DESCRIPTION: Learn how to evaluate and test LangChain applications to ensure they meet performance and accuracy requirements.
This guide help you testing LLMs applications with LangChain.

Evaluation and Testing of LLM Applicatio.COURSE_NAME: Test and Evaluation of LLMs Tutorial
Evaluation and Testing of LLM Applicatio.DESCRIPTION: A tutorial which gives you a basic idea of testing and evaluating LLMs using LangChain.
